item.title: How can i code Bandos Into my server?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Thats not all of it… if your gonna help dont half ass… item.cfg is right, but u also need to add the item id in item.java and item4.java if u have it… So for bandos pl8 , your gonna put the id in platebody int and same put it in the item4.java also put it in the body int too.

item.title: How can i code Bandos Into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

First off, go into your item.java and put the bandos in the correct place
Then, go into your item.cfg and create the bandos, example item = ##### Bandos_Chestplate Bandos_Chestplate. 50000000 50000000 50000000 25 25 25 50 50 25 25 25 25 25 25 25 25 25 The 5000000’s are the price of the item, the 25’s are the bonuses the item gives, where it says item = #### (#'s are item id)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i code Bandos Into my server?
